data.title: McCormick & Schmick's
data.meta_description: Steak & seafood restaurant known for best happy hour and oysters located near Charlotte Convention Center, and Bank of America Stadium for the Panthers.
data.meta_site_name: McCormick & Schmick's | Seafood & Steaks in the US
data.text:
Hours & Location

200 South Tryon St,

Charlotte, NC 28202

(704) 377-0201

SUN - THU: 11:30 AM - 9:00 PM

FRI - SAT: 11:30 AM - 10:00 PM

Happy Hour: Mon - Fri: 3:30 PM - 6:30 PM

Pick Up:

Order Online

Delivery:

Event CateringGrubhubDoorDashPostmatesUberEats

Additional Info

McCormick & Schmick's is conveniently located near the Charlotte Convention Center, the Bank of America Stadium, the Time Warner Cable Arena, and the North Carolina Blumenthal Performing Arts Center.

From fresh seafood and shellfish to aged steaks and garden fresh salads, our goal is to exceed your dining expectations.

As our guest, you will experience culinary excellence at its best. Our menus reflect seafood from the Pacific Rim, the Atlantic Ocean, and the Gulf of Mexico. We also source products from local ranches, farms, and wineries to showcase regionally inspired dishes. Learn about our Sustainable Seafood Program.

Open for Dine-In

View MenusView PromotionsPrivate Dining
